name: dazedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a very confused way, when you are unable to think clearly: He staggered out of his room, dazedly clutching his head. She switched on the bedside lamp and looked dazedly at the clock.
More examplesFewer examplesShe had never felt like this before, she thought dazedly. Dazedly, I got back into bed and tried to work out what had happened.She could be my daughter, he thought dazedly, looking for a resemblance.Suddenly he stopped speaking, and stared dazedly down at his hands.
